cab.content: (This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic Majesty'3 Government.)516SECRETOPERATIONSFrom:- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy,ToG .T .G .SWar Office.Handed in at 2 p.ni, 20,11-17.Received at 3 a.m,21/11.17,734.Situation morning (20th November). 3rd Army. No change in situation,An Italian patrol pushed forward to an Island opposite FLORINA returned with three enemy machine guns and 12 rifles. 4th Army, On morning of 19th after a fierce fight Italians succeeded in recapturing MONFENERA: but owing to heavy hostile artillery fire had to abandon a part of positions gained. One detachment which was able to hold its ground has consolidated its position,1st Army. 20th Corps have improved their position on MELETTA DI GALLIO and captured another 33 prisoners, ? five machine guns and 400 rifles.3rd Corps. Nothing of importance.
